last_episode_to_air.name: Lucius Builds a Spa Town
last_episode_to_air.overview: To undermine public support for the Emperor, some members of the Senate scheme to get rid of the man behind the popular bathhouses: Lucius.

name: Thermae Romae Novae
original_name: テルマエ・ロマエ ノヴァエ
overview: A proud bath architect in ancient Rome starts randomly surfacing in present-day Japan, where he's inspired by the many bathing innovations he finds.

episodes.name: All Baths Lead to Rome
episodes.overview: While bathing in the public bathhouse his grandfather designed and built, a boy in ancient Rome is momentarily transported to a very strange place.

episodes.name: The Thermae Architect Who Leapt Through Time
episodes.overview: Rome, 128 A.D. In a golden age of bathhouse innovation, bathhouse architect Lucius tries to come up with fresh ideas that will set his designs apart.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds an Outdoor Bath
episodes.overview: After Consul Lepidus asks him to build an outdoor bath with a view of Mt. Vesuvius, Lucius suddenly finds himself bathing among strange-looking monkeys.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds an Indoor Bath
episodes.overview: Lucius ends up in a small bathroom in a modern Japanese house and is completely fascinated by everything he finds.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds a Bath in Emperor Hadrian's Villa
episodes.overview: Impressed by his creativity, Emperor Hadrian invites Lucius to his opulent villa and asks him to build a private bath.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds a Hot Stone Spa
episodes.overview: Lucius works to complete a bathing area for soldiers fighting on the front lines — and not a minute too soon, as the men are in dire need of healing.

episodes.name: Lucius Appears on the Tokaido Road in the Edo Period
episodes.overview: While stopping in an unwelcoming tavern during his long journey home, Lucius surfaces in a comfortable Edo-era rest stop along the Tokaido road.

episodes.name: Lucius Learns Bathing Etiquette in Japan
episodes.overview: Lucius encounters a set of very rude bathers who don't seem to know the first thing about proper bathhouse etiquette.

episodes.name: Lucius Meets a Fellow Architect in Japan
episodes.overview: On a construction site for a Roman-style spa in modern day Japan, Lucius meets a fellow bathhouse architect.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds a Theme Bath
episodes.overview: Emperor Hadrian asks Lucius to devote himself to building a large public bathhouse in the name of his son and heir to the Empire.

episodes.name: Lucius Builds a Spa Town
episodes.overview: To undermine public support for the Emperor, some members of the Senate scheme to get rid of the man behind the popular bathhouses: Lucius.
